name: Louise Wind Schroeder
bio:
SCHROEDER In Memory of
Caroline Schroeder
died Jan. 21, 1898
aged 31 yrs. 7 mos. 21 ds.
In Memory of Gideon Yaeger
died Mar. 26, 1889
Ae 29 yrs. 9 mos.
John K. Schroeder
1866-1944
his wife Louise Wind
1870-1952
also 2 f.s
John K. Schroeder
1866-1944
Louise Wind Schroeder
1870-1952
